rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with automatic doors and ramp incline.
Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed for both comfort and accessibility.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural light from skylights.
Master bedroom designed with ample windows to ensure proper ventilation and bright ambiance.
Secondary bedroom maintaining natural light and Vastu principles by orientation.
Third bedroom designed with accessible layout for wheelchair maneuverability.
Fourth bedroom ensuring natural light through large windows.
Fifth bedroom following eco-friendly design principles.
Sixth bedroom with orientation and layout that maximizes light and ventilation.
Library space with abundant natural light, large windows and energy-efficient LED lighting.
Accessible bathroom design with grab bars and non-slip tiles.
Utility area for eco-friendly waste management and storage of cleaning supplies.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with ramp.
Large window for natural light in living room.
Skylight above kitchen area for ventilation and eco-friendly lighting.

vastu_considerations.entrance_orientation: South-East or North direction recommended for positive energy flow.
vastu_considerations.room_arrangement: Rooms arranged clockwise starting from the main entrance to maintain harmony according to Vastu principles.

eco_features: Rainwater harvesting system integrated into design.
Natural ventilation achieved through strategically placed openings.

accessibility_features.wheelchair_access: All doorways, ramps and corridors designed for wheelchair maneuverability.
accessibility_features.bathroom_design: Accessible fixtures including grab bars and wider door frames.
